event.desc: Compete with your Guild to earn Victory Points! Win wars to climb the ranks, and increase your Guild's total points to compete for exclusive rewards!

event.name: TEST Guild War
event.desc: We are testing fixes to recent issues with Guild War. Please bear with us so that we can ensure the stability of the next war.

clash.name: TEST Guild War Placements
clash.reward_desc_label: Your final rankings in the placement will determine your guild's starting rank in the War.
clash.desc: Defeat enemies to increase your guild rank! Your final ranking will determine your guild's starting rank in the war. All enemies start with a Tower card in play. Attacks do not recharge!

event.rank_note: Victory Points are earned based on your placement in Matching at the end of each war.
event.standings_note: Rewards are determined by Victory Points. Victory Points are earned each war based on your Matching placement.

event_reward.desc: Complete the War at Rank 1 or higher.
